cn.title: 关于比特派停用微博工具的公告

message.data: 因运营策略调整，比特派将不再使用微博作为信息发布工具。
官方微博 @比特派钱包 已于 2021 年 6 月 5 日停用
社区微博 @今天派派最帅 已于 2022 年 9 月 22 日停用
后续相关微博 ID 发布的所有信息均与比特派无关，请用户注意甄别。用户可关注比特派唯一官网 https://bitpie.com 与 APP 内资讯板块了解比特派相关动态。

en.title: Announcement on deactivation of Weibo accounts

message.data: Due to the company strategy, Bitpie will no longer use Weibo as an information release media.
Bitpie official Weibo @比特派钱包 has been discontinued on June 5, 2021
Community Weibo @今天派派最帅 has been discontinued on September 22, 2022

All subsequent information released by the above Weibo accounts has no more relationship with Bitpie. Users can follow Bitpie's official website https://bitpie.com and the information section on the APP to know about Bitpie's related news.
